arai_breakdown.interpretation: Critical - Design requires major accessibility improvements

issues.description: Insufficient contrast ratio for normal text
issues.explanation: WCAG 2.1 requires a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 for normal text. Current ratio is 2.31:1.
issues.fix_suggestion: Increase contrast to at least 4.5:1 by darkening text or lightening background.

issues.explanation: This sentence has 44 words, which exceeds the recommended maximum of 20 words.
issues.fix_suggestion: Break this sentence into shorter, clearer sentences.

issues.description: Average line length (20 chars) is below optimal range
issues.explanation: Lines average 20 characters. Optimal is 50-75 characters.
issues.fix_suggestion: Increase line length to 50-75 characters for better readability.

issues.description: Ensure line height is 1.5-2.0x font size
issues.explanation: Line height (leading) should be 1.5-2.0 times the font size for optimal readability.
issues.fix_suggestion: Set line-height to 1.5-2.0 in your CSS or design tool.

issues.description: Use clear, readable fonts
issues.explanation: Choose fonts designed for screen readability. Sans-serif fonts like Arial, Helvetica, or Open Sans work well for body text.
issues.fix_suggestion: Use readable sans-serif fonts for body text and ensure sufficient font weight.

recommendations.title: Shorten Long Sentences
recommendations.action: Break long sentences into shorter, clearer statements

recommendations.title: Optimize Typography
recommendations.description: Improve text formatting for better readability
recommendations.action: Adjust line length (50-75 chars), line height (1.5-2.0x), and font selection
recommendations.impact: Enhances reading comfort and reduces eye strain

recommendations.title: Simplify Text Complexity
recommendations.action: Aim for Grade 8-10 reading level for general audiences
recommendations.impact: Makes content accessible to wider audience

issues.description: Lack of clear visual hierarchy
issues.explanation: All areas receive similar attention, making it unclear what's most important.
issues.fix_suggestion: Create clear hierarchy using size, color, and contrast to emphasize important elements.

issues.description: Design contains 286 distinct elements
issues.explanation: Too many elements increase cognitive load and make it hard for users to focus.
issues.fix_suggestion: Simplify design by grouping related elements or removing non-essential items.

issues.description: Design uses 61 dominant colors
issues.explanation: Using more than 5 dominant colors can overwhelm users and reduce visual coherence.
issues.fix_suggestion: Limit color palette to 5 or fewer dominant colors.

recommendations.title: Reduce Cognitive Load

issues.description: Insufficient contrast ratio for normal text
issues.explanation: This area has insufficient color contrast, making it difficult for users with visual impairments to read.
issues.fix_suggestion: Increase contrast by using darker text or lighter background to meet WCAG standards.
issues.ai_reasoning: Detected using WCAG 2.1 compliance algorithms including contrast calculation and visual analysis. Confidence based on heuristic analysis and pattern recognition.

education.title: Contrast (Minimum)
education.description: Text and images of text have a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 (3:1 for large text).
education.why_important: Low contrast makes text hard to read for users with low vision, color blindness, or in bright lighting conditions.
education.how_to_fix: Use darker text on lighter backgrounds or vice versa. Test contrast ratios using tools like WebAIM's Contrast Checker.
education.example:
Good: Black text on white (21:1)
Bad: Light gray text on white (2:1)

education.title: Non-text Content
education.description: All non-text content must have a text alternative that serves the equivalent purpose.
education.why_important: Screen readers and assistive technologies rely on text alternatives to describe images, icons, and other visual elements to users who cannot see them.
education.how_to_fix: Add descriptive alt text to all images. Decorative images should have empty alt text (alt='').
education.example: Good: Bad:

related_issues.fix_suggestion: Add descriptive alt text explaining the image's purpose and content.

education.title: Target Size
education.description: Touch targets are at least 44x44 CSS pixels.
education.why_important: Users with motor impairments need larger touch targets to accurately tap buttons and links.
education.how_to_fix: Ensure all interactive elements are at least 44x44px or add adequate padding.
education.example:
Good: button { min-width: 44px; min-height: 44px; }
Bad: button { width: 20px; height: 20px; }

recommendations.title: Improve Color Contrast
recommendations.action: Increase contrast ratios to meet WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text)

recommendations.title: Add Alternative Text
recommendations.action: Provide descriptive alt text for all meaningful images and icons

recommendations.title: Add Alternative Text
recommendations.action: Provide descriptive alt text for all meaningful images and icons

recommendations.title: Shorten Long Sentences
recommendations.action: Break long sentences into shorter, clearer statements

recommendations.title: Simplify Text Complexity
recommendations.action: Aim for Grade 8-10 reading level for general audiences
recommendations.impact: Makes content accessible to wider audience

recommendations.title: Improve Visual Hierarchy
recommendations.description: Strengthen visual hierarchy to guide user attention
recommendations.action: Use size, color, and positioning to create clear information hierarchy
recommendations.impact: Helps users quickly understand content structure and importance

recommendations.title: Reduce Cognitive Load
recommendations.description: Current cognitive load: High - May overwhelm some users
recommendations.action: Simplify design by reducing elements, colors, and visual complexity
recommendations.impact: Improves user comprehension and task completion rates

recommendations.title: Optimize Typography
recommendations.description: Improve text formatting for better readability
recommendations.action: Adjust line length (50-75 chars), line height (1.5-2.0x), and font selection
recommendations.impact: Enhances reading comfort and reduces eye strain
